author: maraschmiedt6542
content:
Hi <@!585862088262680577> unfortunately we were unable to record the meeting. 

For everyone who was unable to join or would like a quick recap of our conversation please see below for further details on our updates, progress and next steps:

**1) First SSV PoC Live: **
Thanks to Dankrad's great work the first SSV PoC is now live on Medalla. The PoC leverages a threshold key to allow VCs to come to consensus on attestation signing via Istanbul BFT.

Check out the repo and please test it yourself! https://github.com/dankrad/python-ssv

**2) From PoC to Production**
We are thrilled to announce that the Blox team will be leading the work and project management on the official spec and implementation with a target go-live timeline for Q1/Q2 of next year. 
Please reach out to Alon (@amthatsme) to help out on any particular part of the spec or implementation (DKG, key splitting, sig reconstruction, testing etc.) 
Check out the high-level implementation plan here: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1JNRfYSmCzFSZ2f-tAc1m6OgGC8uDkMpB1u-qt0qFcTo/edit#slide=id.g9befc0d429_0_0

We've spoken with many of you already and have been excited about your openness to support funding for this effort. We will be opening a grants round for the SSV effort in the coming weeks and look forward to your support in making eth2 more secure!
